name: Awesome Pancake Brunch Breakfast Cooking Food Maker
name_original: Awesome Pancake Brunch Breakfast Cooking Food Maker
description:
Its the most important meal of the day, Breakfast! Lets make some Pancakes!

Top Crazy Games is bringing you the best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite pancake recipes. Play and make your own today!

Features:
- Choose your favorite flavors: Original, Strawberry, Blueberry, Chocolate, and more
- Drag ingredients and mix with mixer
- Spray the burner with butter and flip your pancakes
- Choose your toppings! Theres many of it
- EAT IT! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Styles
- Flavors
- Decorations: Syrups, creams, candy, fruit...
- and More!!!!!

Play it for yourself.

Download Awesome Pancake Brunch Breakfast Food Dessert Maker right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Pancake Brunch Breakfast Food Dessert Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
